issue.title: [Archery] unit tests seem to be broken due to "patch" argument not being on constructor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10367](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10367). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`Patch is not a keyword on Version.`

 

`[https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8475/checks?check_run_id=1290624398]`

Seems like something in the SemVer library?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10367?focusedCommentId=17218754) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
yes, sorry did search for it first.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10367?focusedCommentId=17585930) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
